x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xrs1mnd.1 | |- R = ( RR*s |`s ( RR* \ { -oo } ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_xrs1mnd | |- R e. Mnd |
| 3 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( x e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) -> x e. RR* ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( y e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) -> y e. RR* ) |
| 5 |  | #P_xaddcom | |- ( ( x e. RR* /\ y e. RR* ) -> ( x +e y ) = ( y +e x ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( x e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) /\ y e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) ) -> ( x +e y ) = ( y +e x ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) A. y e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) ( x +e y ) = ( y +e x ) |
| 8 |  | #P_difss | |- ( RR* \ { -oo } ) C_ RR* |
| 9 |  | #P_xrsbas | |- RR* = ( Base ` RR*s ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( ( RR* \ { -oo } ) C_ RR* -> ( RR* \ { -oo } ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( RR* \ { -oo } ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 12 |  | #P_xrex | |- RR* e. _V |
| 13 |  | #P_difexg | |- ( RR* e. _V -> ( RR* \ { -oo } ) e. _V ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( RR* \ { -oo } ) e. _V |
| 15 |  | #P_xrsadd | |- +e = ( +g ` RR*s ) |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( ( RR* \ { -oo } ) e. _V -> +e = ( +g ` R ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_ax-mp | |- +e = ( +g ` R ) |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_iscmn | |- ( R e. CMnd <-> ( R e. Mnd /\ A. x e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) A. y e. ( RR* \ { -oo } ) ( x +e y ) = ( y +e x ) ) ) |
| 19 | 2, 7, 18 | #P_mpbir2an | |- R e. CMnd |
